instructions: Open the News app on your Apple Watch. Scroll through the story summary by turning the Digital Crown. To read the story on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, scroll to the bottom of the story, then tap Save for Later. To open the story on your compatible device, do one of the following: iPhone or iPod touch: Open the News app on an iPhone or iPod touch with iOS 12, tap Following, swipe up, tap Saved Stories, then tap the story. i Pad: On an iPad with iOS 12, open the News app, swipe up, tap Saved Stories in the sidebar, then tap the story. Mac: On a Mac with macOS Mojave, open the News app, scroll down, click Saved Stories in the sidebar, then click the story.

Open the News app on your Apple Watch. On your iPhone, double-click the Home button to show the App Switcher. (On iPhone X and later, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause to show the App Switcher.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open News.
